ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But then he rallied and called out,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and gathered his people and declared:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So he gathered the people, and proclaimed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So he gathered and called out,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then he gathered (men) and called out.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And he summoned all his people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then he gathered and cried aloud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then he collected (his men) and made a proclamation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then he gathered his people and cried aloud,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: then, he gathered, proclaimed, then said:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And he gathered [his people] and called out
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:23] Then he gathered, he assembled the sorcerers and his armies, and proclaimed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then gathered he) his army (and summoned) and delivered a sermon
